name: classic stuffed bunny
notes:

**free pattern available on my blog here:**
http://www.1dogwoof.com/floppy-stuffed-bunny-crochet-pattern-easter/

if you're looking for a simple classic stuffed bunny rabbit, then try this one! it's nothing fancy, just soft, squishy, super huggable, and easy to work up. 

note: both bunnies pictured are made using the same pattern. only the yarn/hook combination has changed. yarn, hook, and gauge/tension will affect the same of your finished bunny.

………………………………………………………………………………

patterns are written in us crochet terminology and is available only in english.
